projects.title: Horse-Bets
projects.summary: A single page Web App, used for getting racing horse odds.
projects.description: A simple betting application made for my father. The user selects the horses recent placements and the app calculates scores
projects.challenges: I wanted to make everything run without needing to reload the page. This led me to wripting code my first app with JavaScript. While syntax was never an issue, getting a grip on the JavaScript/HTML interaction was tough.

projects.title: Album Anniversary
projects.summary: An email reminder system for Album Birthdays
projects.description: This app notifies the user with an email when it is the anniversary of an album in their collection. Notification includes the age, a summary of the album and the album art.
projects.challenges: This was my first real program. So naturally everything was a challenge. A big one was how to find album anniversaries in a common format and the possibility of albums with the same name. Luckily my personal album list wasn't affected

projects.title: MACD-Alerts
projects.summary: A stock watching app that notifies of STOCH/MACD crossover in a set of selected stocks
projects.description: An app that scans a users stock portfolio for a Stochastic/MACD double crossover and emails the user with a relative buy or sell signal.
projects.challenges: A lot of the challenge for this program came in getting the circles on the graph in the right spot. They needed to keep track of the Y value on the graph, and as my coding skills were limited, I most likely took the long route. But it still looks good.
